website_summaries.verdict: The Amped High Power 800mW Dual Band AC750 Wi-Fi Router (TAP-R2) features a neat color touch screen and plenty of settings, but it only has two wired ports and its performance comes up short.
cons: Two wired ports do not support Gigabit Ethernet

customer_reviews.title: Works Great with Security
customer_reviews.text: If you are in tuned with building security with your home network, this is the affordable product for you. This runs like a champ with no concern of hackers or security loss. Even if you do not know how to amplify the security, the built default security is still very impressive. If you find a problem of dropped signal, check your modem. It is very likely that the signal is not being sent properly to the router. Get this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part but Good Seller
customer_reviews.text: I can't write a fair review here because the antenna was missing and the unit would not work as a result. The router appeared to be easy to set up and operate, based on the instruction booklet. That said, I am giving 2 stars because the seller accepted my return and issued a refund within a week.
customer_reviews.author: D. Beeksma

customer_reviews.title: NO customer service or warranty
customer_reviews.text: Horrible customer service. Contact 3 times and never got a response. Highly recommend going with trust worthy brand. There warranty is a joke since they aren't going to respond to emails or calls. Unit drops signal all the time. Great concept, horrible company/service.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works for now...
customer_reviews.text: Not as great as they make it sound. The time changes on it all the time for some reason. The touch display is very difficalt to use and seem very cheap. Not all that impressed with the range either. Will buy a few repeaters to make it better. After that I think it will be great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Byron

customer_reviews.title: I replaced the modem and things are mostly better. The 5
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a month or so and appreciate the diagnostics and display screen that consistently showed me a modem problem. I replaced the modem and things are mostly better. The 5.0 channel sometimes doesn't work or is out of range (even when I'm in the next room). The 2.4 channel has always been fine. I'm glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: cathy h.

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure this is good quality since it is from Amped Wireless
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong model number and got this instead. I'm sure it is a great modem, but I wanted their SR300 instead (which I finally got) so I can't honestly rate it. But from the quality of the SR300 Extender and Amped Wireless excellent customer support, I venture to say this is probably good.
customer_reviews.author: A. Peake

customer_reviews.title: Slow and unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Product was relatively easy to set up but the wifi was unreliable and very slow, it didn't reach to other rooms in the apartment and we ended up switching back to the old router that had some of the antennas broken because it worked better than this one. I wouldn't recommend this. It's worth spending a bit more to get a more consistent signal.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Wyse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product! Easy install/setup! Best overall range coverage as compare to Netgear model 6200 recommend by internet service provider! Same exact location= Netgear 70% signal strength Amped 83% signal strength! That alone says it all!
customer_reviews.author: Joycelyn M. Mire

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to set up
customer_reviews.text: Not working, impossible to set up. I am an electronics guy for at least 40 years. Not happy with this product. I ordered another wifi extender from a competing company and worked perfectly, first time try and with in ten minutes. That is all I can say about the Amped Wireless High Power Touch screen
customer_reviews.author: Richard L

customer_reviews.title: This was not a new product. Dissapointed in the packaging and the scuffs all over the thing... ugh.
customer_reviews.text: Box came all messed up, product looks damaged, was supposed to be wireless, its not, scratched on the device, though it was a new item, far form it.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is kick butt I have 7 acres will reach 6 to do my outdoor movies by wifi easy setup great instructions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it comes set up with two networks for both 2.4 and 5.0, and it is touch screen. Even the website is self explanatory. Once setup you don't ever have to touch it again
customer_reviews.author: fred J.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine it worked perfectly for streaming my many devices that I have
customer_reviews.author: Debbieann1969

customer_reviews.title: I thought this would be more high power that I ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be more high power that I have experienced. The reviews seem to indicate that it would have long range and I haven't experienced the same outcome.
customer_reviews.author: arlene

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and great coverage for my android and iOS products as well as the Echo and peripherals.
customer_reviews.author: Octavius

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The product was defective. It would not boot past the logo screen. Completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: T. P. Johnston Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not something I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Had a Linksys ES2500 in my basement and this did not preform as well as what I already had even adding a booster.
customer_reviews.author: MrSmall

customer_reviews.title: it is effective and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It did not have the full range I needed. However, it is effective and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: James Beavers

customer_reviews.title: The one that I did get wasn't any better than my old router which I hooked back up
customer_reviews.text: Not much luck getting my TVs connected. The one that I did get wasn't any better than my old router which I hooked back up. When my son comes home next I'll see if he can try getting it working.
customer_reviews.author: David Oberstar

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to set up and greatly improved the reception on ...
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up and greatly improved the reception on our Roku, laptop,and phones. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and use with my computer and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and use with my computer and all peripheral devices! Good reception throughout the house and on patio.
customer_reviews.author: Regina M. Kavanagh

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It was easy to setup and the signal ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It was easy to setup and the signal is great. Wish it was closer to the 10,000 sq/ft mark, but I understand the household restrictions of wifi and am ok with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, a heck of a lot better than the crappy Comcast router.
customer_reviews.author: Northside 415

customer_reviews.title: I think Amped wireless AC750 is a great. It worked right away
customer_reviews.text: I think Amped wireless AC750 is a great . It worked right away. I have not had any problems. Dependable product.
customer_reviews.author: gale taylor

customer_reviews.title: The product is easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to setup, has a good set of home routing features. Too bad the Wi-Fi is lame and week. RF coverage is terrible. So sent this back because the wireless was far worse than my previous router.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Blais

customer_reviews.title: Not functioning
customer_reviews.text: Didn't amp anything. As matter of fact , the internet is actually slower.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Barraza

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up wifi
customer_reviews.text: amped wireless wifi units are the easiest units to set-up (even I could do it!!!).....love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST WIRELESS SYSTEM EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This item, in conjunction with the extender unit is the best I have ever used...covers 3 floors with NO disruption and automatic resets after power failures...forget the "benefits" of the touch screen...it does not function well, but it really doesn't matter...online setting is simple.
customer_reviews.author: longboater

customer_reviews.title: Good signal, EZ setup
customer_reviews.text: Significantly wider range than our old one. Extremely easy set-up -- plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great router
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised with how easy it was to set up the router and extender. I live in an old house with lots and lots of plaster. Our cable is on the first floor and we get decent signal there but nothing on the upstairs. That all changed with the extender. Awesome signal everywhere in the house. I am not a computer person at all, but the set up was super easy and was done in under 5 minutes. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: kae16

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to setup and improved my internet signal throughout the house 100%!!!
customer_reviews.author: ryan fenner

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Horrible connection. Ports are always closed it seems. Doesn't work at all for Xbox always lags. Should have bought a netgear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The router was defective right on the box. The touch screen was not working properly. I was on the phone for a half hour with tech-support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still needs to be hooked up to the router!, what was the point if it's to extend the range
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Dyson

customer_reviews.title: almost no signal strength
customer_reviews.text: Router is 50 feet away on the other side of an interior wall and i get zero signal. I have an old lynksys from 10 years ago, about 200 feet and two interior walls and i get a perfect signal why did i buy this thing?
customer_reviews.author: William Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: and signal strength is worse than my 10 year old router
customer_reviews.text: This router is just awful. Only 2.4 works consistantly, password protection causes conflicts with wireless printer, and signal strength is worse than my 10 year old router. If it was a local sale it would be returned in a heartbeat. Meanwhile it is presently being used as a bookend while i've gone back to my 10 year old router. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Scott B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: please i want to return this product because i order it buy mistake
customer_reviews.author: Othman Alyafei

product_meta.title: Amped Wireless High Power Touch Screen AC750 Wi-Fi Router (TAP-R2)
product_meta.description:
The TAP-R2 High Power Touch Screen AC750 Wi-Fi Router shares your broadband Internet connection and provides extreme range with just the tap of your finger. The TAP-R2 features a 3.5" color touch screen display for easy setup without the help of any additional devices. It is equipped with 6 advanced amplifiers and a detachable, dual band high gain antenna to boost your Wi-Fi coverage by up to 3X the distance of other Routers. With 2 wired ports, you can also directly attach additional Internet devices like smart TVs and game consoles. The TAP-R2 is a high performance Router, built in an attractive and compact design and with the most simple setup available. With features like Digital Clock Mode, you won't want to hide in a cabinet like other devices. The TAP-R2 is a sleek and powerful addition to any home or office network.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: The First High Power AC750 Wi-Fi Router with Touch Screen display
Experience ultra-fast AC750 Wi-Fi speeds for superior streaming experiences
Set up in minutes with the easy touch screen setup, no computers or other devices needed
Achieve up to 3X the coverage of other Wi-Fi Routers, eliminating dead spots
Features high power amplifiers and antennas for maximum performance and range
Compact & elegant design, equipped with a modern digital clock display for discreet desktop or wall-mounted placement
Built with 2 Ethernet ports for connecting PCs, Smart TV’s, game consoles etc., and 1 USB file sharing port
Elite Support: Amped Wireless’ free, US based, in-house, technical support

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars85 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
